title: The Palazzo Dell' Accademia Di Francia (The Palazzo Salviati). Veduta nella Via del Corso, del Palazzo dell'Accademia istituita da Luigi XIV, Re di Francia (View of the Corso from the Academy begun by Louis XIV, King of France)
provenance_text:
M. Knoedler & Co., New York, NY; sold to Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on April 1, 1927 until December 8, 1948 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1948.

Notes:
[1] Purchased for $15; see original invoice dated April 1, 1927 (for purchases made on February 26, 1927) in curatorial file.
